law.catch_line: Driving under the influence or reckless driving.
law.text: Any person subject to this code who operates or is in physical control of any vehicle while under the influence of alcohol or any other substances or combination of substances which impair one's driving ability, or in a reckless or wanton manner, shall be punished as a court-martial may direct.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 114, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 85.
